text: Georgiy Vasilyevich Kolnootchenko (, ; born 7 May 1959) is a retired discus thrower from Belarus, who still is the national record holder with a distance of 69.44, thrown on 3 July 1982 in Indianapolis, United States. He won the silver medal in the men's discus event at the 1986 European Championships in Stuttgart, West Germany. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="5"|Representing |- |1982 |European Championships |Athens, Greece |5th |62.82 m |- |1983 |World Championships |Helsinki, Finland |6th |64.74 m |- |1986 |European Championships |Stuttgart, West Germany |bgcolor="silver" | 2nd |67.02 m |} ==References== *AllTimeRanking Category:Belarusian male discus throwers Category:Soviet male discus throwers Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:European Athletics Championships medalists
title: Georgiy Kolnootchenko
